welcome little adventurers to our magical world of shapes today we're going on a thrilling journey to discover the wonders of shapes and their amazing
properties are you ready let's go
look kids we are in the circle Carnival circles are round and have no corners they are everywhere at the carnival the
wheels the Carousel and even the cotton candies hi everyone I am a circle we welcome to square City where squares
rule the streets squares have four equal sides hey there I am a square I make buildings strong and sturdy Behold The Majestic triangle
Mountain triangles have three sides and they love reaching New Heights hi friends I am a triangle climb with me to the top of the
world time to relax and have fun at rectangle Beach rectangles have four sides just like squares but their sides can be different
lengths hello everyone I am a rectangle I make sand castle super cool here we are at the oval Park ovals are like circles but stretched out they
are egg shaped and love rolling around hey kids kids I am an oval let's play and have a ball welcome to the heart Gardens a
place of love and joy hearts are special shapes representing love and kindness hi dear ones I am a heart love is all around in my
garden and there you have it my young adventurers we've had a fantastic time exploring the magic iCal world of shapes
from circles to squares triangles to rectangles and ovals to Hearts each shape has a unique story to tell we had so much
